pageContent: Purpose: Patient selection for focal salvage remains difficult. Therefore, we developed and internally validated prediction models for biochemical failure (BF) and a composite endpoint (CE) following focal salvage high intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) for radiorecurrent prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Three-dimensional visualization and analysis in prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12532172/
